Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The front desk staff weren t very friendly and their communication lacked I emailed the property on two separate occasions regarding our very late check in and received no reply
Positive_Review: Right next to the Sants station Rooms are modern and clean Wifi was great

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Cleaning could be a bit better Dodgy looking flats or apartments just behind the hotel
Positive_Review: Breakfast was great Proximity to Sants Station Central between most areas around Barcelona and the airport One train ride to the airport Sound proofing

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Prepayment 5 commission charged for paying in non Euro currency when we weren t given the option to pay in Euros even though this is stated on the bill that s already paid it was our choice it clearly wasn t
Positive_Review: Clean modern rooms very nice design offers all mod cons large TV wifi fridge rooms can be a little small Excellent location for overnight stay for onward train travel

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No issues really but would gave been nice to have tea making facilities in the room
Positive_Review: Very close to the railway station room service staff member was very helpful They also acted on our request to have a room on the lower levels

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Nothing bad to report Didn t find any issues and hotel facilities and staff were up to the expected standards
Positive_Review: Great location is your work or leisure visit floats around Sants train station just a few steps away from it Very good breakfast good quality and plenty of options Comfortable bed cozy room peculiar but decent bathroom set with plenty of amenities Plenty of public transports options and restaurants around Fluid check in and check out process

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The WC was separated from the bath area and there were no hangers in or outside around the bathroom to hang clothes or towels It was very uncomfortable as we stayed as a group family There were no single beds and had to pay for wifi facilities Because of the inconvenience of the bathroom setting it was not worth it
Positive_Review: The staff and the cleanliness of the hotel was good The location was very convenient and easy to find

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No bathroom door Shower overlooked by bed Toilet in a wardrobe cupboard with no lock and no extractor TV size utterly overbearing Bright blue light on TV shining at bed preventing sleep Way too hot in room No soda water in bar
Positive_Review: Close to station but there are alternatives

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Positive_Review: Next to the Sants train station Very convenient to commute Was pleasantly surprise by the size of the room and amenities available Good value for money

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: I booked this hotel for the purpose of the gym but the facilities were not as advertised and we were very disappointed with what was available to us when specifying the use of a gym when searching for a hotel this was one of the first to appear not good
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Staff were courteous but not particulary friendly I wanted to book an additional night on our return and the receptionist told me to go online We did go online but subsequently found a better property for a cheaper price I thought that was a missed opportunity for your business
Positive_Review: Rooms were clean and well appointed Location was great for us as we were leaving on an early morning train and it was ideally located to the station

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: No tea coffee making in room and no onsite eatery only room service
Positive_Review: We were only there a few hours between train and plane In that time it filled our basic needs It is very handy to train station

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Staff were not as expected I was promised that my points should be added to my Marriott rewards membership upon departure Nothing has been added up till now and when contacting Marriott s rewards worldwide I get an answer that any booking made through a third party isn t entitled to points If that s true shouldn t I have been told by the hotel employees Disappointing
Positive_Review: Location is good next to a metro station

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Positive_Review: Just good value and beside major train station and metro line Very easy to get around the city Staff very friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Towels were missing from the room I asked for room service at 10 45pm for 1 salad and they told me that the kitchen is closed while they are mentioning on the room service that guests can order till 11 00pm A C was not working
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: strange open plan bath room facilities
Positive_Review: Great location next to Sants station which you can get a train straight from Barcelona airport staff very helpful

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Positive_Review: Very close to Sants railway station We did use this hotell becouse we travel with small children and could easy find our way fast to the hotell and travel to Salou the next day from the same railway station It is also lots of places to eat outside the railway station and inside McDonalds

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Positive_Review: Being so close to the main train station is great for people travelling by plane as the airport train arrives approx 100 from the hotel and all regional trains leave from the same rail station Staff were fantastic The local metro also makes it very easy to go to any where in the city

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The location is the worst Is very far from every point of interest of the city The neighborhood is terrible
Positive_Review: The day time girl Laura was the only nice persona that work in that hotel The other staff members were very unfriendly

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The noisy hotel and unfriendly staff
Positive_Review: It is good if you are travelling by train But it is very noisy and the staff is not friendly or helpful They only had one receptionist that had to answer phone calls and check in and check out customers She must have been a student doing a summer job

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Some issues with the wifi fitness center very small and basic Overall we were very satisfied with the stay
Positive_Review: Excellent location if you travel by train well connected by public transport to the rest of the city very new and modern rooms comfortable bed everything very clean

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Location is perfect but there are petty economies on things such as shampoo and towels The room was quite small and the room design exacerbated this The staff were lovely
Positive_Review: The location and the staff

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The air conditioning It was hot and more food options were needed They also need a guide for tourist on how the local transportation works etc
Positive_Review: Best location for traveling around the city lots of food options in the same block atms etc

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Would loved to have had a tea coffee tray with kettle in room rather than a minibar but room service was prompt and not too expensive However just read another review about free tea and coffee in the hall which I was not aware of a note in the Room Service Menu to mention this would have been useful
Positive_Review: Right beside Barcelona Sants station so perfect for an overnight stay between trains and will use again Good sized room for a double with large comfy bed

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: It looked like they were renovating and it was let down by little things let it down such as dreadfulTV reception no soap dish for the basin surface finishes and so on
Positive_Review: Location right next to Barcelona Sants was excellent Comfortable bed quiet room very helpful staff Could have been a great little hotel

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: I encountered 3 reception staff during my stay there They were all surly and gave me the impression they would much prefer it they did not have to deal with me The reception desk was unattended one evening and when the receptionist eventually came from a room at the rear she was still eating When she spoke to me it was quite clear she had been enjoying a glass of rioja with her meal The pair of well worn trainers she was wearing certainly did not go well with the uniform she was attired in either I asked her what Night Bus serviced the area of Sants she just shrugged her shoulders and said she did not know I would normally only comment on staff if the my expierence has been positive but in this case I feel I need to make an exception The room was quite small with one of those bathrooms that are not separated from the sleeping area by an actual bathroom door just a narrow sliding door To get to the wardrobe you had to pass through this area All a bit fiddly
Positive_Review: Next to Sants Railway and Metro Stations so handy for access to both Airport and City Centre I recommend using the R line to Passeig De Gracia as it is only 1 stop and trains are much less crowded than the Metro Line Comfortable bed I was on a room only basis so I cannot comment on the quality of the breakfast

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: After a long train journey was disappointed that no hot food was served at the weekend breakfast only available from 8am which was too late for me
Positive_Review: The room location was perfect

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: I found the breakfast extremely expensive for what is offered Very small rooms and not confortable bed I was expecting to have the marriott standards was a bit disappointed
Positive_Review: Location near the main train station

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Being next to the train station meant a few dodgy characters but not a big issue The bed was not the most comfortable but it was all right
Positive_Review: location is great for public transport but quite far away from the centre So if you need a cab it will take a while to get to your destination Very clean and most importantly staff are always there to help There is also a mini shop at reception so if you forget your tooth brush you can buy one

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: I found staff to be somewhat Indifferent not too warm and friendly Sometimes the desk was not covered with no one in sight
Positive_Review: Perfect location to public transportation Clean rooms

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The room and the bathroom are in an open space it s not comfortable if one should weak up earlier or going at night
Positive_Review: Big and comfortable bed Good soundproof

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Sink is in the room You enter directly into the shower cabine from the room If you share a room with someone your privacy is compromised

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Sants a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The hotel reseptionist was hopeless She kept up waiting for 30 mins while she took telephone calls before she checked us in which took half a minute Very unprofessional I shall never ever stay at this hotel again
Positive_Review: Close to the railway station the bedroom was clean and comfortable
